title: Cognitive diagnostic  models
text:
Installation

Required

R (≥ 4.2)
rstan (≥ 2.21.8)
measr (≥ 0.3.1)

Recommended

RStudio (≥ 2023.03.1+446)
cmdstanr (≥ 0.5.3)
CmdStan (≥ 2.32.2)

title: Cognitive diagnostic  models
text:
Copy and run

install.packages(c("rstan", "StanHeaders", "cmdstanr"),
                 repos = c("https://mc-stan.org/r-packages", getOption("repos")))

# check toolchain
cmdstanr::check_cmdstan_toolchain()
cmdstanr::install_cmdstan(cores = 2)

install.packages("measr")

For help installing RStan or configuring the toolchain, see the RStan help pages.

title: Schedule
text:
show_table <- function(group_id) {
  # Add a heading
  cat(as.character(paste("\n\n###", schedule_nested$group[[group_id]], "\n\n")))
  
  # Make the table
  tbl <- schedule_nested$data[[group_id]] %>% 
    select(-subgroup) %>% 
    kbl(escape = FALSE, align = "rlccc", table.attr = 'class="schedule-table"') %>% 
    kable_styling() %>% 
    column_spec(1, width = "20%", extra_css = "padding-right: 20px;") %>% 
    column_spec(2, width = "50%") %>% 
    column_spec(3:5, width = "10%") %>% 
    pack_rows(index = schedule_nested$subgroup_index[[group_id]],
              label_row_css = "border-bottom: 2px solid #000000;")
  
  cat(tbl)
}
